pageProduct.name: Sambucol Cold & Flu Forte 24 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sambucol Black Elderberry Cold & Flu Forte capsules combine the power of Sambucol's original Cold & Flu relief with immune supporting ingredients. Uniquely formulated with premium Black Elderberry plus Vitamin C & Zinc.

Sambucol Cold & Flu Forte helps support immune function. A healthy, strong immune system is important during the cold season. That is why we recommend to start taking Sambucol Cold & Flu Forte at the beginning of the cold season. With easy to swallow capsules containing concentrated Black Elderberry fruit juice powder combined with immune supporting ingredients Vitamin C and Zinc. Get Better Faster with Sambucol.

Sambucol Black Elderberry Cold & Flu Forte helps to:
- Support immune health to fight illness
- Reduce the severity and duration of common Cold & Flu symptoms: Sore Throat, Congestion, Cough & Fatigue

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Contains sulfites and sugars.

Ingredients

Each capsule contains:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderflower)
fruit juice dry 81.43mg
equiv. to fresh juice 2.85g
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 250mg
Zinc (as Zinc Gluconate) 3mg

Contains: "Each capsule contains:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderflower)
fruit juice dry 81.43mg
equiv. to fresh juice 2.85g
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 250mg
Zinc (as Zinc Gluconate) 3mg"

Directions

Best taken at first sign of cold or flu symptoms or as directed by your health professional.
Adults (Cold & Flu Support): 2 capsules 4 times daily
Adults (Immune Support): 2 capsules 1-2 times daily

Adults only. Keep out of reach of children. Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Do not use if the blister foil is broken or damaged. Store below 25°C.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Do not use
if the blister foil is broken or
damaged. Store below 25°C.
